full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI NGAG THOR BU BA PHYOGS GCIG TU SGRIGS PA LAS KLU GTOR GYI RIM PA BZHUGS, ,
